Subject: how to drill down to AD Security Assessment Report
Description:
Hi Team, 

There's an ongoing audit, i would need your support to check how we can drill into this report as of now i can only see the summary but unable to drill deeper
What_We_Know__c:
The customer is currently undergoing an Audit for Active Directory. To complete the audit requirement, they ran the AD Security Assessment report and wanted to know how to dig down on the points highlighted by the report. By default, we cannot navigate directly from the report to details page. A FR is created for that 46605187. 

However, to aid the customer a KB (https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/z-kb-articles-salesforce/page/kA0Qk0000001gV3KAI.html) has been shared that can assist the customer to manually look for details in respective job/report.
Next_Steps__c: I will follow up with the customer tomorrow for any follow up questions.
